abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Petrifying Visage: Beings that look at it for the first time on their Turns must pass [Endure] against Sickened or take 1 Fatigue. A Being with 3 or more Fatigue that gains another Fatigue this way is cursed (petrified as a stone statue until this medusa dies). Bestiary Bestiary 144 144 Mimic TL: 2.6 Medium Cryptid Tends to shapeshift into chests, chairs, and doors, lying in wait for undiscerning prey. Some adventurers tell tales of intelligent mimics that have helped them on their journey. HD: 5 (22 HP) Speed: 10' Zone: Frontline Morale: 9 # Appearing: 1 Senses: Darksight Armor: 1 [as Leather] ACTIONS Bite [Melee Attack]: 9 (2d8) and Restrained if smaller Mimic [Action (Focus)]: It takes on the appearance of an Object that is its size or smaller for the Duration. Pseudopod [Melee Attack]: 7 (3d4) ABILITIES Adhere: Hinders Checks to end being Restrained by it.
